resources.string:
"In the middle of the night, The Rats and their leader The Giant Rat sing their legendary chant:
Rats: Rats, we're rats, we're the rats. We prey at night, we stalk at night, we're the rats.
Giant Rat: I'm da giant rat that makes all of da rules!
Giant Rat and Rats: Let's see what kind of trouble we can get ourselves intoï»¿!"
